title: assertion failed: st.current_test_count() == st.total in library/test/src/console.rs
body:
Just updated some gems and faced this panic in my cargo bench run. `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.64.0 (a55dd71d5 2022-09-19) binary: rustc commit-hash: a55dd71d5fb0ec5a6a3a9e8c27b2127ba491ce52 commit-date: 2022-09-19 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.64.0 LLVM version: 14.0.6 ```
Backtrace

``` Finished bench [optimized] target(s) in 0.19s Running benches/benches.rs (target/release/deps/benches-46440df5d91b2604) running 0 tests test bench_publish_insecure ... bench: 203,456,689 ns/iter (+/- 41,151,057) thread 'main' panicked at 'assertion failed: st.current_test_count() == st.total', library/test/src/console.rs:296:5 stack backtrace: 0: 0x564bfd2d4c10 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::libunwind::trace::h3c14a0cb86067d9a at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/libunwind.rs:93:5 1: 0x564bfd2d4c10 - std::backtrace_rs::backtrace::trace_unsynchronized::hf807147dbdf50cd4 at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/../../backtrace/src/backtrace/mod.rs:66:5 2: 0x564bfd2d4c10 - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print_fmt::h6a633f6bf5f226ad at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:65:5 3: 0x564bfd2d4c10 - ::fmt::h4c7e19178eef72eb at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:44:22 4: 0x564bfd290e0e - core::fmt::write::h4e2851e7943b0d7e at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:1209:17 5: 0x564bfd2a8c54 - std::io::Write::write_fmt::h732b470b2a7d735e at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/io/mod.rs:1682:15 6: 0x564bfd2d62bf - std::sys_common::backtrace::_print::h207fe05013c11b5b at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:47:5 7: 0x564bfd2d62bf - std::sys_common::backtrace::print::ha8f562f79d7e2b5d at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:34:9 8: 0x564bfd2d5ebf - std::panicking::default_hook::{{closure}}::h9b1936479d3218ec at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/panicking.rs:267:22 9: 0x564bfd2d5ba7 - std::panicking::default_hook::hb9b50eee8bb6683c at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/panicking.rs:286:9 10: 0x564bfd2d6c8c - as core::ops::function::Fn>::call::hf51660563da73d98 at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/alloc/src/boxed.rs:2001:9 11: 0x564bfd2d6c8c - std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook::hc8cdc088f3b878b0 at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/panicking.rs:692:13 12: 0x564bfd2d69f3 - std::panicking::begin_panic_handler::{{closure}}::h966f2ec80c2de8f4 at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/panicking.rs:577:13 13: 0x564bfd2d698c - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_end_short_backtrace::hfeb4c4072ac73884 at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/sys_common/backtrace.rs:137:18 14: 0x564bfd2d6961 - rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/std/src/panicking.rs:575:5 15: 0x564bfd285312 - core::panicking::panic_fmt::h20cccfa0b51a5c7c at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/core/src/panicking.rs:65:14 16: 0x564bfd28540c - core::panicking::panic::h4606bd700c3c1c61 at /rustc/77e57db384aca99444c3b5f6a9c86bc58a804d89/library/core/src/panicking.rs:115:5 17: 0x564bfd28dd04 - benches::main::h38970ac7e96351ea 18: 0x564bfd289dc3 - std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::he172034b6c72ca00 19: 0x564bfd28e489 - main 20: 0x7fbd529ead0a - __libc_start_main 21: 0x564bfd289cfa - _start 22: 0x0 - error: bench failed, to rerun pass `--bench benches` ``` P.S. If I can provide you any additional info - please ask me to.
